title: Display school logo on the login page

requirements.summary: Display the school logo from localStorage settings on the Login page above the login form, with fallback placeholder if no logo is uploaded
acceptanceCriteria: When a school logo has been uploaded via Admin Settings, it is visible on the login page above the login form.
When no logo is uploaded, a fallback icon or placeholder is displayed in the same position.
The logo display is consistent in style with how it appears in the sidebar (Layout.tsx).
The rest of the login form layout and functionality remains unchanged.

file_operations.description: Add logo display above the login form by reading settings from localStorage using the storage utility. Display the logo image if settings.schoolLogo exists, otherwise show a School icon (lucide-react) as fallback. Style the logo container consistently with the sidebar logo in Layout.tsx (rounded-lg with appropriate sizing). Position the logo centered above the existing login form card without modifying the form's authentication logic or layout.
